About Stiwdio

Here at the Stiwdio Agency, we believe that freelancing holds the answer to many problems.

Your business is bound to need specialist work from time to time. USW Freelancers have specialist skills, software knowledge, and access to equipment- but in order to share this with the wider community, we need a framework in place. A framework that protects the freelancer from extortion and ensures timely payment, but also provides guidance; advice on fees, workload, etc.

A framework that saves you time and heartache searching for talent - one that forwards your job brief to the most suited candidates and lets you choose from their proposals.

A framework that promotes the graduate and shows off their skill, saving them time to work hard and hone their trade.

The Stiwdio Agency will unite graduates with businesses over a common goal: the completion of your job brief.

Challenge our talent, collaborate with the future and watch our freelancers come up with fresh ideas!
